sentences.sContent: Organisms rely on phosphorus to build nucleic acids and other molecules to grow and proliferate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Organisms rely on phosphorus to build nucleic acids and other molecules to grow and proliferate.
sentences.sCn: 有机物依赖于磷来制造核酸和其他生长与繁殖所需的分子。

sentences.sContent: Working with subsurface ice, brine or soil samples, SETG would attempt to isolate, amplify, detect and identify nucleic acids -- right there on Mars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Working with subsurface ice, brine or soil samples, SETG would attempt to isolate, amplify, detect and identify nucleic acids -- right there on Mars.
sentences.sCn: SETG研究了地下冰、盐水或土壤样本，试图隔离、放大、监测和识别核酸，这种核算恰好就在火星上。

sentences.sContent: Thus, any random changes in the interior, fledgling ribozymes that could speed up nucleic acid replication rates will spread rapidly through an evolving population.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, any random changes in the interior, fledgling ribozymes that could speed up nucleic acid replication rates will spread rapidly through an evolving population.
sentences.sCn: 这样一来，细胞内部发生的使得核酶加速核酸复制速率的任何变化，都会在进化群体中快速扩散。
